list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the direction toward the point of the horizon where the sun rises at the equinoxes, on the right-hand side of a person facing north, or the point on the horizon itself.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a gale was blowing from the east
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một cơn gió đang thổi từ phía đông

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the eastern part of the world or of a specified country, region, or town.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a factory in the east of the city
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một nhà máy ở phía đông của thành phố

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the player sitting to the left of North and partnering West.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: East passes and you respond one heart
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: East Passes và bạn trả lời một trái tim

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: lying toward, near, or facing the east.
of or denoting the eastern part of a specified area, city, or country or its inhabitants.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: traveling east, he met two men
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đi về phía đông, anh gặp hai người đàn ông
